formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: New Elo Rating: \( R_{\text{new}} = R_{\text{current}} + K \times (\text{Result} - E) \) \( E = \frac{1}{1 + 10^{\frac{(R_{\text{opponent}} - R_{\text{current}})}{400}}} \)
